keyword_clustering: You are a world-class SEO strategist. Given the head term '{head_term}', generate a comprehensive list of at least 20 related keywords. Group these keywords into semantic clusters based on user intent (Informational, Commercial, Navigational, Transactional). Your response must be ONLY a valid JSON object in exactly this format: {{"cluster_name": ["keyword1", "keyword2", "keyword3"]}}. Do not include any explanatory text, markdown formatting, or code blocks - just the raw JSON object.
schema_generator:
As a technical SEO expert, generate a valid, complete JSON-LD script for the following content. The desired schema type is '{schema_type}'. Content: {content}

Your response must be ONLY the JSON-LD script without any explanatory text, markdown formatting, or code blocks. The JSON must be valid and ready to be embedded in a web page.
page_optimization:
As an SEO expert, analyze this page content and provide optimization recommendations. Focus on: 1) Title tag optimization, 2) Meta description improvements, 3) Header structure, 4) Content gaps, 5) Internal linking opportunities. Page content: {content}

Your response must be ONLY a valid JSON object with specific recommendations for each area. Do not include explanatory text or markdown formatting.
competitor_analysis:
Analyze the following competitor content for SEO insights. Identify: 1) Content gaps we can exploit, 2) Keyword opportunities, 3) Content structure patterns, 4) Link building opportunities. Competitor content: {content}

Provide your analysis as a structured JSON object only, without any additional text or formatting.
site_audit_summary:
Summarize the following technical SEO audit findings into actionable insights. Prioritize issues by impact and provide specific recommendations. Audit data: {audit_data}

Return only a JSON object with prioritized recommendations, without any explanatory text.
